channel.title: Changing NPC stats
channel.description: I think I'm possibly retarded, I cant find the file or the spot to change my NPC's strength or att, I dunno if theres even a file like that. Ive searched about 3 different forums using the search bar, found nothing. Dont reply saying "use search bar" when its obvious that I already have. Now, if someone could please just reply with the file name and possibly something to search for in that file id greatly appreciate it. Thanks.

item.title: Changing NPC stats
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:

uhm u can hit with mage i dont really care for it If u want ill get you the code’s for it

item.title: Changing NPC stats
item.dc:creator: @epic_demic epic_demic
item.description:
@epic_demic wrote:

thankyou very much, your most possibly the only person ive spoken to that has been actually helpful in the last week. Now, if i might ask, any idea on how to make him hit with mage?

Read full topic

item.title: Changing NPC stats
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

search this in your npc handler

} else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2030){ npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 2062; hitDiff = 10 + misc.random(3);
simply copy and paste and change stats u want it to hit so for hitdiff = 10 (if u want its lowest hit to be 10 you leave it 10 if u want it 15 u change it to 15
then + misc.random(3) it means it can hit up to 13 if u want it to hit 15 u make the misc random to (5) mess around like that

Read full topic
